feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 12:30 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: -4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: ENE 33 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow and blowing snow beginning before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then northeast 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023
